name: github_bulk_star
description: Star multiple GitHub repositories in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling github_star_repo multiple times. Pass repo URLs as a comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const starBtn = document.querySelector('button[data-ga-click*="star"], form.unstarred button, .js-toggler-container:not(.on) button.btn-sm'); if (!starBtn) { const alreadyStarred = document.querySelector('form.starred button, .js-toggler-container.on button'); if (alreadyStarred) return { status: 'already_starred', repo: window.location.pathname.substring(1) }; return { status: 'error', repo: window.location.pathname.substring(1), message: 'Star button not found' }; } starBtn.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 1000)); return { status: 'starred', repo: window.location.pathname.substring(1) }
detailSteps.name: star_result
detailSteps.label: Star repo
